channel.title: Server crashes
channel.description:
When people are fighting at the training dungeon or Pking i dunno the server gets some error: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.berserk(client.java:185) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:27281) at client.process(client.java:16122) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:55).
Whats the problem though? Im using Augeas Pkz server.

When people are fighting at the training dungeon or Pking i dunno the server gets some error:
